duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee all technology operations, including restaurant POS, data administration, IT security, and telecommunications.
Plan and manage technological change, devise and establish IT policies and systems.
Build and maintain relationships with outside vendors and manage 3rd party vendor relationships.
Perform project management for various technology initiatives including installations, implementations, and upgrades.
Maintain data, develop reports, and communicate technology issues to management and end users.
Facilitate new restaurant IT deployments and provide after-hours and weekend support as required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in computer science or technology related field (graduate degree a plus)
